name: XPC Development Suite
short_description: XPC:  A set of "Cross Platform C/C++" projects, a framework for basic software development.  Includes a unit-test library (C), a C++ wrapper for it, and a utility library (C).  Includes extensive design/tutorial documentation and Debian support.
